name: RTCDataChannel.close
description: The RTCDataChannel.close() method closes the RTCDataChannel. Either peer is permitted to call this method to initiate closure of the channel.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCDataChannel.close()' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
